---
title: "EPL 21-22"
---

```{r, eval=TRUE, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(shiny)
library(DT)

ui <- fluidPage(
  h2("The 21-22 Premier League Season"),
  DT::dataTableOutput("soccer")
)

server <- function(input, output) {
  output$soccer = DT::renderDataTable({
    soccer
  })
}

shinyApp(ui, server)

```
